subject: Order Update
description_text:
Order number SSN1826
Please check my order. It has no shipping updates all week. Thanks

If possible please expedite.

conversations.body_text: Hi Rhys Benham,    Sorry for the delay in your order due to the first Vam Pro stock depletion. However it has shipped today and is expected to arrive around the 11th, here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEXB2466850256YQ
